headline: Stronger-Than-Expected Adjusted Earnings And Viterra Synergies Might Change The Case For Investing In Bunge Global (BG)
summary: Bunge Global SA recently reported fourth-quarter 2025 results, with sales rising to US$23,762 million from US$13,542 million a year earlier, while net income fell to US$95 million from US$602 million and diluted EPS from continuing operations declined to US$0.49 from US$4.36. Despite the lower GAAP profit, the company exceeded analyst expectations on adjusted earnings and highlighted early synergy gains from its transformational Viterra combination. We’ll now examine how the...
